name: Berek 2000
description: Berek 2000 is a tag play for up to 4 players. At the beginning "berek" is chosen randomly or through eliminations. It can be set in game options as well. Eliminations base on the fast finding the exit from eliminations level. Exits are 3, randomly set at the level. The player which stays as last one becomes "berek" in a real game. To not to be "berek" one player have to collide with another player, then the next one is the one. The new "berek" will be frozen for a few seconds, to allow escaping from it. In the center of the screen every player has the time counter. When it'll reach the upper border, then the game is to end. When the player is "berek" in this moment, he loses the game. The time counters can work synchonically or only for "berek".
